welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Berkhampstead, where history and modernity blend seamlessly. Get ready to discover its rich heritage, picturesque landscapes, and vibrant culture. We invite you to immerse yourself in our city and enjoy all it has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Luton Airport is used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to executive and VIP travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow, featuring modern facilities and a wide range of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: One of the busiest terminals at Heathrow, with a variety of airlines and direct connections to major cities around the world.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Home to many international airlines, Terminal 4 offers a convenient and efficient travel experience for passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow, serving as the main hub for British Airways and offering a luxurious and upscale travel experience.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with unlimited access for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Benson Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Benson Airport serves as a base for RAF operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oxford Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
